Ultra Space Ships

Welcome to the new and awesome game Ultra Space Ships.

Controls

Up - Down - Left - Right : Movement

Space - Enter : Fire

Winner 2nd #ArcadeGameJam

Power by Godot Engine

Requirements: OpenGL 3.3 / OpenGL ES 3.0

Github: https://github.com/MatiasVME/Ultra-Space-Ships
